tgt_original: taduktaṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ prathamaślokavyākhyāne--sa eva sahajakāyaḥ śūnyatāvimokṣaviśuddho jñānavajraḥ sarvajñaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ śuddhayoga iti |
sa eva dharmakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmātmā yoga ityucyate |  animittādeva tarkābhāvaḥ,
sa eva dharmakāyo'nimittavimokṣaviśuddhaścittavajro jñānakāyaḥ prajñopāyātmako dharmātmako yoga yutyuktaḥ |
sa eva saṃbhogakāyo'praṇihitavimokṣāviśuddho vāgvajro dinakaravapuḥ prajñopāyātmako mantrayoga ityuktaḥ |
sa eva nirmāṇakāyo'nabhisaṃskāravimokṣāviśuddhaḥ kāyavajraḥ padmapatrāyatākṣaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ saṃsthānayoga iti | (se. ṭī., pṛ. 5-6)
ṣaṭkulāni  akṣaraṃsukhaṃ jñānadhātuḥ,  vijñānamākāśadhātuḥ,  saṃskāro vāyudhātuḥ,  vedanā tejodhātuḥ,
kanyāyā rajaḥkālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ veditavyam |
puruṣasya śukracyutikālaṃ yāvat trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ veditavyam |
tathā mūlatantre bhagavanāha -- “trikulaṃ pañcakulaṃ caiva svabhāvaikaṃ śataṃ kulam“ iti | (vi. pra., pṛ. 50)
